item.description:
Rockledge is conveniently located in West Hartford just a couple of minutes off 84. They are holding group Golf Adult Beginner lessons. These lessons are not just for our meetup. You'll need to sign up individually and "meetup" with each other there.

There's no meetup organizer for this event (any volunteers)?

Details:

Beginner golf lessons for adult players age 18 and up with little or
no golfing experience. A 9 hole voucher to play at Buena Vista
Golf course is included. In case of heavy rain, or any questions,
please call Rockledge Golf Club at 860-521-6284. Rain make ups
will be announced by instructors. Instructor: Rockledge Staff.


414730E
Mon/Wed 6:30 - 7:30P 06/01 - 06/10 (4 classes)
$72 for West Hartford Residents $83 for others


LOCATION: ROCKLEDGE GOLF CLUB

Register on-line, Fax or Mail to Town Hall, Customer Service Desk.
On-line registration link ... https://west-hartford...

Note: If you cant make the training above, there's another class starting next week:
414730D Tue/Thu 6:30 - 7:30P 05/18 - 05/27 $72 for West Hartford Residents $83 for others
item.how_to_find_us: Look for each other in the pro shop.
item.name: Adult Beginner Lessons - Rockledge
